data.text:
BELL

Michael ‘Mike’ F. Bell, age 61 on July 24, 2017. Born June 10, 1956 in Fort Bragg, NC to surviving parents William and Paula Bell. Also survived by son Dave Bell; daughter Alyson (Chris Appleton) Bell; granddaughter Emily Appleton; 1 brother Keith (Diana); 2 sisters Carolyn (Mark) and Marianne (Winston). Mike was an employee with over 25 years of service at DuPont as a chemical engineer. He loved playing golf and racquetball. Most important, a loving and dedicated father who loved to travel and attend sporting events with his family. “It was always an adventure with Mike” A gathering to celebrate Mike’s life will be held Saturday, July 29, 2017 from 10:00 am – Noon at the SHAW-DAVIS FUNERAL HOMES, Clintonville Chapel, 4341 N High St, Columbus, OH 43214.
